price: Nuko ukabona abantu binjira mu idini rya Allah ku bwinshi,
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
